      • EncryptDecrypt

        public EncryptDecrypt(java.lang.String password)
               throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                      javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Constructor that takes the the password, adds salt and creates a hash. This hash is then used to generate the key.
        Parameters:
        password - The input entered by the user
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

                         throws javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,

        This method will take a given string and encrypt it using the SecretKey and AES algorithm.
        Parameters:
        clear - the clear string that shall be encrypted
        Returns:
        the encrypted String in Base64 encoding

        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
